DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Smoked at Least 100 Cigarettes in Entire Life Smoking Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates whether a person has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their entire life, where 5 packs is equal to 100 cigarettes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use Smoked at Least 100 Cigarettes in Entire Life
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing._A question about whether an individual has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their entire lifetime.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Use of tobacco in any form i.e. smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Concepts.definition: Use of tobacco in any form, e.g., smoking, chewing or sniffing.

Property.preferredName: Smoked at Least 100 Cigarettes in Entire Life

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

PermissibleValues.value: Not applicable; I have not smoked cigarettes since my diagnosis.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Not Applicable Have Not Smoked Since Diagnosis

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Not Applicable Have Not Smoked Since Diagnosis
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.: A response indicating that an individual has not smoked since they have been diagnosed with cancer.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A response indicating that an individual has not smoked since they have been diagnosed with cancer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Don't Know or Not Sure When Smoked a Cigarette
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know or is not sure whether they smoked a cigarette.

Concepts.longName: Don't Know or Not Sure When Smoked a Cigarette
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual doesn't know or is not sure whether they smoked a cigarette.
